explains: v. （数量、价值等）暴跌；（尤指从高处）坠落

sentences.en: The glamour stocks of the age saw their values plummet.
sentences.cn: 当时的魅力股的价值大大缩水。

sentences.en: Everyone expects Broadway's box office to plummet in September.
sentences.cn: 大家都预料到9月百老汇的票房会大幅下跌。

sentences.en: After menopause, when estrogen levels plummet, some women become forgetful.
sentences.cn: 绝经期后，当雌激素水平骤然下降，一些女性开始变得健忘。
